_comment: Cascade Registration Configuration - Rigid + Affine (Automatic Two-Stage)
_description: Performs Rigid registration first, then uses the result to initialize Affine registration for optimal accuracy
_note_learningRate: Per-level learning rates for both stages: coarse levels use larger steps (1.0), fine levels use smaller steps
_note: 5-layer pyramid strategy used for BOTH Rigid and Affine stages
_example: .	est_registration.ps1 fixed.nrrd moving.nrrd output\ -config config\Rigid+Affine.json -initial coarse.h5
_workflow: Stage 1: Rigid (6 DOF) -> Stage 2: Affine (12 DOF, initialized from Rigid result)
_output: Final transform is Affine, incorporating both stages automatically
